1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural entrepreneurs, Aries often excel at turning their passions into profitable ventures.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - With a strong sense of practicality and an eye for detail, Tauruses can be successful at managing finances and investments.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis are naturally talented at finding creative solutions to financial challenges.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Cancers often prioritize emotional security over material wealth, but their nurturing nature can help them build strong relationships that lead to financial stability.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Charismatic Leos have a natural flair for sales and marketing, making them well-suited for careers in finance and entrepreneurship.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Meticulous and analytical, Virgos are detail-oriented and can excel at managing budgets and financial records.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and fair-minded, Librans often have a natural talent for negotiating and mediating financial disputes.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios are naturally driven to succeed in finance and can excel at high-stakes transactions.
9. Sagittarius - 6/10 - Free-spirited Sagittarians may struggle with the confines of traditional finance, but their adventurous nature can lead them to creative financial opportunities.
10. Capricorn - 8/10 - Ambitious and disciplined, Capricorns are well-suited for careers in finance and business, where they can apply their strategic thinking.
11. Aquarius - 7/10 - Humanitarian Aquarians often prioritize social causes over personal wealth, but their innovative nature can help them develop unique financial solutions.

12. Pisces - 5/10 - Dreamy Pisces may struggle with the practicalities of finance, but their empathetic nature can help them build strong relationships and find financial stability through emotional connections.
